oai_dc:dc.dc:title: William G. Brownlow : fighting parson of the Southern Highlands
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Coulter, E. Merton (Ellis Merton), 1890-1981

Contents: Foreword / by Durwood Dunn -- Introduction / by Stephen V. Ash -- Crusading in the Southern Highlands -- A new parson rides the circuit -- Personal journalism -- Religious warfare renewed -- Black slaves and mountain whites -- Ante-bellum politics -- Secession -- East Tennesseeans rebel against rebellion -- In jail and out -- A tour of the North -- Back in Tennessee -- A new governor seeks vengeance -- The minority establishes itself -- The reign of the Tennessee radicals?-- The storm before the calm -- The like shall not be seen again -- Bibliography -- Index
